issue_title: [Feature] 添加 Todo 不可变性/拷贝支持（__eq__, __hash__, copy 方法）
approach: Added __eq__, __hash__, and copy methods to Todo dataclass. __eq__ compares id, text, done (ignoring timestamps). __hash__ hashes the same tuple for consistency with __eq__. copy() creates a new instance with optional field overrides.
risks: None identified. The implementation follows Python conventions for __eq__, __hash__, and the copy method uses existing to_dict/from_dict methods.
limitations: The hash is based on id, text, and done - if any of these fields change on a Todo that's already in a set/dict, it will break (standard Python mutable-hashable caveat).
